item.title: Who is the real 'heinous bitch' in this Shakespearean adaptation?
item.description: Movie poster of 10TIHAY featuring Heath Ledger and Julia Stiles In an unapologetic hustle to combat monotonicity, I ended up rewatching “10 Things I Hate About You” yesternight. The rather cocky title that crowns this post was a question that sprung to my mind during that watch. I think someone said it right when they said you don’t really watch a movie the first time because your brain is all so involved in processing the actions, dialogues, props, making sense of the storyline and generally answering the question, “What’s it about?
